body.name: Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, Lightweight Stick Vacuum with 18Kpa Powerful Suction, 6-in-1 Rechargeable Vacuum, Max 40 Min Runtime Battery, Handheld Vacuum Cleaner for Home Hard Floor Pet Hair
features: 🏡【Effortless Cleaning with Powerful Suction】 Transmart M1 cordless vacuum allows you to choose between standard suction (12KPA) and turbo suction (18KPA) modes to tackle diverse cleaning tasks. Meet your various cleaning needs of pet hair, fine dust, crumbs,etc. Especially the vacuum is lightweight enough to handle. It only weights 2.6 pounds.

🏡【Detachable & Rechargeable Battery】 Transmart M1 cordless vacuum cleaner is equipped with a 2200mAh 6-cell battery, offering wireless convenience. M1 stick vacuum cleaner runs up to 35 minutes in standard mode and around 20 minutes in turbo mode (actual times may vary).

🏡【180° Rotatable LED Brush Head & Mutiple Accessories】 M1 cordless sitck vacuum got 3 LED lights built in brush head,lighting up every corner of your home to ensure colleting any dirt and debris. The vacuum includes flat suction nozzles and brush expansion, easily reaching floor, curtain, ceiling, and corners for meticulous debris removal by directly connecting the nozzles to the main body or install them at the end of the expansion tube.

🏡【5-Stage Filtration System】 M1 cordless vacuum cleaner adopts 5-stage advanced fully sealed filter system: cyclone filtration, cylinder filtration, HEPA filtration, filter hole cover, stainless steel Filter, this cordless stick vacuum cleaner efficiently captures 99.99% of dust particles. 0.68L large dustbin collects all the dust at one time.

🏡【Warranty】 Transmart cordless vacuum provides 12-Month warranty and 7*24 after-sale service for our valued customers. No worry about any after-sales problems! It is an ideal gift choice for yourself, your family, and your friends. Experience hassle-free cleaning and enjoy a cleaner and healthier home with this high-performance vacuum cleaners for home.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Lightweight Cordless Vacuum Cleaner With effortless maneuverability and cord-free convenience, these vacuums redefine cleaning ease. Powerful suction effortlessly handles debris on various surfaces, while the sleek design and adjustable features ensure no corner goes untouched. Say goodbye to traditional cleaning hassles and embrace the future of effortless cleaning with our wireless vacuum cleaners.

Stretchable Metal Tube Experience enhanced cleaning flexibility. Effortlessly reach high shelves, tight corners, and under furniture, making cleaning a breeze. Easy to Empty & Washable Filter One click the button to achieve garbage dumping, Maintain optimal suction and prevent blockages by regularly rinsing the metal strainer and mesh filter with cold water. Detachable Rechargeable Battery The 2200mAh detachable rechargeable battery ensures consistent power for wireless vacuums, while its 2 charging method enhances flexibility.
Note: Non hard floors can be cleaned in mode turbo, and it is not recommended to use on medium & high-pipe carpets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it! A Lightweight Powerhouse
reviews.reviewText: I have been using the Transmart cordless vacuum cleaner for a month now. It absolutely has exceeded my expectations. The vacuum's ability to switch between standard and turbo suction modes is a game-changer, so effectively taking away all the trash in my room from hair to dust. The lightweight design, at only 2.6 pounds, makes it incredibly easy to handle, reducing the strain of cleaning. It's absolutely a great alternative to the expensive Dyson vacuum cleaners.The detachable and rechargeable 2200mAh battery provides ample run time, lasting up to 35 minutes in standard mode. This wireless convenience allows me to clean without the hassle of cords. The 180° rotatable LED brush head is another standout feature I really enjoyed, illuminating dark corners and ensuring no dirt is missed. The multiple attachments, including flat suction nozzles and a brush expansion, make it versatile for cleaning floors, ceilings, and hard-to-reach areas.The 4-stage filtration system impressively captures all the dust particles, and the dustbin is spacious enough for extended cleaning sessions. I also appreciate the 12-month warranty and the responsive after-sale service, adding an extra layer of confidence in my purchase.Overall, the Transmart vacuum cleaner is a top-tier cquality hoice for anyone seeking a powerful, lightweight, and versatile cleaning tool. I've used Dyson and Shark before and the performance of this Transmart vacuum cleaner is defintiely on par. It's transformed my cleaning routine, making it quicker and more efficient. A fantastic investment for a cleaner, healthier home. Thumbs up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best upgrade ever !
reviews.reviewText: Got this to end the year strong. From wired vacuum to this is such a blessing thing. I never need to worry about putting it away with wires and everything now. Didn’t want to spend a ton on a Dyson so I got this. And omg. It’s amazing. It sucks very well and also sweeps at the same time so it’s actually extra clean compared to my previous vacuum ( just sucking ). Def a good upgrade without breaking the bank !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Don't know why i didn't get one sooner. Works well, the only thing is i have a very hairy dog and this vacuum is a little small to handle all the hair i vaccuum up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love this vacuum
reviews.reviewText: It makes it so easy to clean bc no plugging into a wall outlet or have to detangle cords!! It cleans very well.It swivels and has a light on it. Removing the dirty container is not the easiest to do. But, overall I am very happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The long-lasting power and powerful suction power will give this product points. The startup sound is not loud, so you won't be startled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very good vacuum cleaner
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I like how it is very quiet. I cleans my floor very well. It can be broken down to and attach to other parts, also some parts my extend. This is a cordless vacuum cleaner so when I charge it, I can walk around with out a cord following me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't waste your money!
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited to get this delivered today and couldn't wait to use it. I have 2 dogs and hardwood floors, so I have to sweep at least once a day to keep the hair tumbleweeds to a minimum. I was hoping this machine would help with that, but wow, was I wrong. The suction on this vacuum is laughable, even using the turbo button! It's already been packed back up and will be returned tomorrow. If I could give it no stars, I would. Don't waste your time and money on this sucky vacuum that barely sucks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Purchased a cordless vacuum cleaner to replace the previous wired and bulky one. It is easy to use and has sufficient power to vacuum carpets.
